main event: An observer spotted a silver object moving rapidly in Waynesville, North Carolina on 7 Oct 61.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for less than one minute,The object appeared to be the size of a small star,The object disappeared to the north after the sighting,The observer used an elevation viewpoint, and there was insufficient data to definitively classify the object.
sighted object: a silver object in the sky
witness description: an individual observing the object with an elevation viewpoint
